text: Hunu gau i au daangada e hai nadau daaligi dangada bolo gii kumi nadau hui. Hunu gau e wanga nadau teenedi gi hongo teenedi o dono ehoo dangada Israel dela ne madau, bolo gi maluagina ginai. Digaula gu delangahia ginaadou Au.” Aanei la nnelekai mai baahi o Tagi go Yihowah.22.12 Exodus 22.25; 23.8; Leviticus 25.36-37; Deuteronomy 16.19; 23.19
